mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CAST(id AS NUMBER)) AS id FROM MEMBER

SELECT M.id, M.name, M.company_id, M.pwd, M.email, M.tel, M.profile, M.hireday, M.Resignation, M.birthday, M.resident, M.depart_id, D.depart_name, M.team_id, T.team_name, M.rank, M.salary, M.bank, M.contract, M.sign, M.state, M.e_state, M.KEY, M.authoriry, M.enabled FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN department D ON M.depart_id = D.depart_id LEFT JOIN team T ON M.team_id = T.team_id
